meanings.sent1: The king's crown was the supremest symbol of his power.
meanings.sent2: She held the supremest position in the company as the CEO.
meanings.sent3: The cat believed himself to be the supremest ruler of the household.
meanings.sent4: The eagle soared high in the sky, the supremest creature of the air.
meanings.sent5: The mountain peak stood as the supremest point in the landscape.

meanings.definition: Of the highest quality or degree
meanings.sent1: The supremest chocolate cake melted in her mouth.
meanings.sent2: The artist used the supremest paints to create his masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The supremest ice cream flavor was a delightful surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the supremest expression of joy.
meanings.sent5: The supremest fabric felt luxurious against her skin.

meanings.sent1: The storm brought the supremest winds we had ever experienced.
meanings.sent2: His love for her was the supremest emotion he had ever felt.
meanings.sent3: The supremest roller coaster ride left her breathless with excitement.
meanings.sent4: The supremest heat of summer made the asphalt sizzle.
meanings.sent5: The supremest fear gripped her heart as she entered the dark forest.
